reviewText: An eighties feel good love story.
If not for her extraordinary face, the whole would have been shredable.

This is Korean version of the DVD and highly censorshipped.
Some of the Spphie's shots are cutten off.
I urge you to avoid this dvd.
I bought this one from Korea in 2$ and ended up with not even watching it once. It was like PG-13 in Korea and it's suppose to be R.
Now I downloaded the European version from some site and that one was uncut version.
Dig the french site or something if you really want to own this movie.
